Content: i want to play minecraft java with mods on
i followed instructions and they wont load.
it doesnt show up at all
and forge wont load them too
autotip was in there when i installed forge
i figured it all out_ so thank you for your time
i had a different game directory
thats why it didnt load the mods in .minecraft\mods folder
because i looked in the folder
a new mods folder was created
ok so_ i put the mods in the game directory
i will tell you if it does
